statements: UPDATE remote_team_communication SET message = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE remote_team_communication SET timestamp = '2022-06-30 12:00:00+00' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE remote_team_communication SET message = 'Meeting rescheduled for next week' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE remote_team_communication SET timestamp = NOW(), receiver_id = 456 WHERE sender_id = 789 AND message LIKE '%urgent%';
UPDATE team_communication SET message_text = 'New message text' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE team_collaboration SET collaboration_type = 'New type', collaboration_description = 'Updated description' WHERE collaboration_id = 2;
UPDATE team_communication SET message_text = 'Updated message' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE team_collaboration SET collaboration_description = 'New description', collaboration_type = 'Task' WHERE collaboration_id = 5;
UPDATE team_members SET member_role = 'Manager' WHERE member_id = 1;
UPDATE messages SET message_text = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE sender_id = 4;
UPDATE team_members SET member_name = 'Alice', member_role = 'Manager' WHERE member_id = 1;
UPDATE messages SET message_text = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4;
UPDATE communication_logs SET message = 'Updated message!' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE team_members SET position = 'Senior Developer' WHERE member_id = 2;
UPDATE communication_logs SET sender_id = 101, receiver_id = 201, message = 'Updated message' WHERE log_id = 10;
UPDATE team_members SET position = 'Senior Developer', department = 'Engineering' WHERE member_id = 5;
UPDATE team_members SET role = 'Manager' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE team_files SET file_size = 500 WHERE file_id = 2;
UPDATE team_members SET email = 'newemail@example.com', role = 'Manager' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE team_channels SET channel_name = 'New Channel Name', topic = 'New Topic' WHERE channel_id = 3;
